pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Broker SystemPython module for connecting to a broker server as an agent. The broker server must have the following REST interfaces.- /api/v1/agent/msgbox Message box for receiving requests from clients. Messages must be returned as a list.- /api/v1/agent/report An interface to return results to the client, receiving results as JSON and interpreting the results with keys starting with @ as properties.- /api/v1/agent/config Interface for receiving agent settings.- /upload Interface for uploading a file.### Version history- 0.2.0 Add file transfer functionality. Still $\alpha$ version.- 0.1.0 $\alpha$ version
